definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: To reduce pounds to pence you multiply by a hundred.
sentences.chinese: 鎊乘以一百就摺合成便士。

sentences.english: Her husband recently spent several hundred pounds on menswear here.
sentences.chinese: 她的丈夫最近在男裝部花了幾百鎊錢買衣服。

sentences.english: The raising of twenty-five thousand pounds was a task altogether beyond her powers.
sentences.chinese: 要籌集兩萬五千鎊錢她完全無力辦得到。

sentences.english: I think he can rake in ￡500 a week.
They rooked me of  ￡5 for the theatre ticket.
sentences.chinese: 他們將戲票轉讓給我，敲了我5鎊。

sentences.english: The boxer weighs three hundred pounds and walks like a veritable colossus.
sentences.chinese: 這個拳擊手重三百鎊，走起路來像個十足的巨人。

sentences.english: You should've beaten him down to three pounds.
sentences.chinese: 你本來可以砍到三鎊的。

sentences.english: He asked me ￡ 5 a month as rent for that house.
sentences.chinese: 那間房他每月向我要五鎊的租金。

sentences.english: Give me back nine pounds, Jane; I've a use for it.
sentences.chinese: 把五鎊還給我，簡，我要派用處。

sentences.english: I sprang 400 pounds for  her overcoat.
sentences.chinese: 給她買那件大衣，我花了400鎊。

sentences.english: They had already escaped away with jewelries worth thousands of pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他們已經帶着價值數千鎊的首飾逃之夭夭了。

sentences.english: Three thousand pounds! he could spare so considerable a sum with little inconvenience.
sentences.chinese: 三千鎊呀，我可以毫不費勁地省出這麼一筆鉅款。

sentences.english: The judge said the assets amounted to(3) just over 131 million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 法官說他的全部身家總計超過一億三千萬鎊。

sentences.english: We wrote off $ 500 for depreciation of machinery.
sentences.chinese: 註銷了500鎊作爲機器折舊費。

sentences.english: The clerk embezzled a thousand pounds from the bank where he worked.
sentences.chinese: 那個職員在他工作的銀行裏貪污了一千鎊。

sentences.english: The price of a television set cascaded to 320 pounds last week.
sentences.chinese: 電視機價格上週暴跌到每臺320鎊。

definition: to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
